FILE: cm450630v11.0.txt
DYAD: LIBERIA - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV1072
DISPUTE(S): MID2593 MID2808 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180915
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180915

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2593

TERRMID: MID2593 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2593 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2593 from Gibler 2018, a Liberian oil tanker was attacked by Iran during the Iran-Iraq war, a territorial MID. Coded third party link to teritorial MID because Iran routinely bombed ships trading with Iraq during the Iran-Iraq War to harm Iraq's economy. 

MARITMID: MID2593 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2593 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2593 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2593 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2593 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2593 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2593 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2808

TERRMID: MID2808 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2808 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2808 from Gibler 2018, this is another incidence of Iran bombing a Liberian oil tanker for trading with Iraq during the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial MID. Coded third party link to teritorial MID because Iran routinely bombed ships trading with Iraq during the Iran-Iraq War to harm Iraq's economy. 

MARITMID: MID2808 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2808 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2808 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2808 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2808 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2808 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2808 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
